name: Kids In Need of Defense
description: To ensuring that no child appears in immigration court without high quality legal representation, KIND provides the following services: - Advancing laws, policies, and practices that ensure children’s protection and uphold their right to due process and fundamental fairness; and - Promoting in countries of origin, transit, and destination durable solutions to child migration that are grounded in the best interests of the child and ensure that no child is forced to involuntarily migrate.
